title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
NOTE: On the AP Exam, to earn a point for a rubric row, responses will need to meet all criteria for that row.

Points earned:

+1 [Skill 3.B] The response includes a code segment that shows how data has been stored in the list.

+1 [Skill 3.B] The response includes a code segment that shows the data in the same list being processed, such as creating new data from the existing data, as part of fulfilling the program’s purpose.

Do NOT award a point if:

● The use of the list is trivial and does not assist in fulfilling the program’s purpose.

+1 [Skill 3.B] The response identifies the name of the list being processed in this response.

+1 [Skill 4.B] The response describes what the data contained in the list represents in the program.

Do NOT award a point if:

● the written response does not name the selected list.

● the description does not apply to the selected list.
descriptions:
